Notes: If SMPaym_PaymElig_v1r0 is 1, SMPaym_Round_v1r0 equals 0 and RcrtES_Site_v1r0 is 8 then SMPaym_NORCPaymElig_v1r0 is 0; if SMPaym_PaymElig_v1r0 is 1 and SMPaym_Round_v1r0 equals 0  and RcrtES_Site_v1r0 ne 8 then SMPaym_NORCPaymElig_v1r0 is 1
Derivation Notes: This variable is needed to exclude UChicago participants from NORC's payment list. Additional derivations will be developed for follow-up Rounds. Uses same time stamp as SMPaym_PaymElig_v1r0. Variable is set as a default and is nested under SMPaym_Round_v1r0
